scripts.optimize-images: sharp -i ./michael-wentz-portfolio/img/*.webp -o ./michael-wentz-portfolio/img/300 resize 300 --withoutEnlargement true && sharp -i ./michael-wentz-portfolio/img/*.webp -o ./michael-wentz-portfolio/img/600 resize 600 --withoutEnlargement true && sharp -i ./michael-wentz-portfolio/img/*.webp -o ./michael-wentz-portfolio/img/900 resize 900 --withoutEnlargement true
